title: Marcello Cestaro
text:
Marcello Cestaro (born 1938) is an Italian businessman and the current owner and chairman of Serie A1 <a href="women%27s%20basketball">women's basketball</a> club <a href="PF%20Schio">Pallacanestro Femminile Schio</a>. He is a native of <a href="Schio">Schio</a>, <a href="Province%20of%20Vicenza">Vicenza</a>, Italy. Until June 2013, he was also owner and chairman of <a href="Serie%20B">Serie B</a> club <a href="Calcio%20Padova">Calcio Padova</a>.
Cestaro has business interest in supermarket and <a href="hypermarket">hypermarket</a>, with the brands "Famila", "Emisfero", "A&O" and "Cash and Carry" managed by his company "Unicomm Srl". He entered into <a href="association%20football">football</a> in 2004, detecting the <a href="Calcio%20Padova">Calcio Padova</a> militant at time in <a href="Lega%20Pro%20Prima%20Divisione">Series C1</a>. Since 1986, he has also been the owner of Pallacanestro Femminile Schio.
